title: add_contributors — add_contributors
text: repo Vector repository locations contributions extracted. location must git project github remote. Default single repository current working directory. ncols Number columns contributors 'README' files Names files add contributors type Type contributions include: 'code' direct code contributions (including documentation), 'issues' recognise contributors open issues, 'discussion' contributing discussions within issues. Discussion contributions individuals present either 'issues' 'code'; 'issues' contributions individuals present 'code'. exclude_label Exclude contributions issues specified label (default = "wontfix"; set NULL empty string include issues). exclude_issues Numbers issues (pull requests) excluded lists contributors. exclude_not_planned TRUE (default), exclude contributions issues closed "planned". num_sections Number sections divide contributors: 1 contributions within single section regardless type 2 Contributions divided single section code second section issue-related contributions. 3 Contributions divided single sections three type arguments. section_names Names sections appear nominated files. format One ("grid", "list", "text") control display contributors 1 "grid" rectangular grid, contributor represented github avatar, avatar linked contributor profile name linked repository contributions. 2 "list" condensed list github user names avatars, one contributor per line linked issue contributions. 3 "text" single line text containing comma-separated github user names linked issue contributions. check_urls TRUE (default), GitHub URLs contributors checked ensure still valid. (generally time-consuming stage, set 'FALSE' sure URLs valid.) alphabetical TRUE, order contributors alphabetically, otherwise order decreasing numbers contributions. open_issue TRUE, open edit issue github order notify contributors added README (see Note). force_update TRUE, update specified files even contributions changed.
